Class NotificationClient

extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NotificationClient.Listener
      Interface to add on Bit6 instance in order to get updates if new message or notification (typing and message update) arrives.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(NotificationClient.Listener listener)
        Adds listener to NotificationClient instance. The listener is called when new message or notification (typing or message update) arrives.
        Parameters:
        listener - NotificationClient.Listener
